name: Lion LCD Game
description:
Long description Oh, no, the cages are broken and the lions are trying to escape. Try to keep the lions inside by moving the two zookeepers. Game A has two lions, while game B has three. This is a remake of a classic LCD handheld game.
The game features are:
• Retro gameplay true to the original.
• Easy to learn.
• Hard to master.
• Hi-score and bonuses.
